title: Olympic Summer Games - revenue generated from domestic sponsorships 1996 to 2016
yAxis: Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016_Rio to 2008_Beijing.
But, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2004_Athens to 1996_Atlanta.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2008_Beijing to 2004_Athens.
gold: The statistic shows the revenue generated from domestic sponsorships at the Olympic Summer Games from 1996 to 2016 . The 2016 Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro generated about 848 million U.S. dollars in sponsorship revenues .
